sentences.sContent: He was uncertain how much further he could walk.
sentences.sCn: 他不清楚自己还能走多远。

sentences.sContent: ...Add a rapidly changing economy and an uncertain future to this 24/7 connectivity...
...Management is all about making difficult tradeoffs in conditions that are always uncertain and often fast-changing...

synos.tran: 无常的；含糊的；靠不住的；迟疑不决的

words.tran: 不确定地；没把握地；犹豫地
